name: Lyra
info:
Very few even know the detached, composed, low-profile, current manager of the Maidelin Foundation exists.
Not one to meddle, but definitely pitches in when things hit the fan.
"I'm just following Ms. Maidelin's will."
description:
The sole heir to Ms. Maidelin, a renowned contributor to many technology fields, and was regarded by her as her closest family.

How exactly to execute Ms. Maidelin's last will and the reasons behind her decisions can no longer be traced... But Lyra does exhibit an attitude similar to Maidelin when it comes to administration.

Because of the working partnership with Hykros, Lyra holds a certain influence in its hierarchy, though very few people are aware of that due to her low-profile personality.

skills.name: Normal Vesper Attack Passive
skills.description: Enlightenment: Upon hit, Vesper's normal attack without Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to targets bearing the Enlightenment mark, equal to the number of Guards you carry x 6.4% of ATK (no more than 38.4% x ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage. Upon hit, Vesper's normal attack with Benediction Resonance deals extra damage to targets bearing the Enlightenment mark, equal to the number of Guards you and teammates carry x 4.6% of ATK (no more than 36.8% x ATK in total). That damage will not trigger extra attack effects and is regarded as discharge skill and weapon skill damage. Glowing: Upon hit, all of Vesper's normal attacks recover HP equal to 15% of ATK. Sacred Strike: Vesper's aerial attack and Accumulator can convert 60% of charge to shatter. Guard: For every 15% loss of HP or every 300 weapon charge gained, obtain up to 5 Enlightenment Guards for yourself (can be produced in the off-hand slot). Enlightenment Guard lasts for 25 seconds. If your own Enlightenment Guards are full, the new Enlightenment Guards will attack enemies, dealing physical damage equal to 120% of ATK, then disappear. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects. Note: In Bygone Phantasm, Vesper is not regarded as a support weapon.

skills.name: Normal Vesper Attack
skills.description: While on the ground, use Vesper to launch 5 consecutive attacks. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 81.6% of ATK plus 4 and knock the target back a short distance. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 59.1% of ATK plus 3 and knock the target back significantly. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 123.9% of ATK plus 7 and knock the target back a short distance. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 173% of ATK plus 9 and suspend the target. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 196.4% of ATK plus 10 and launch the target.

skills.name: Frustration
skills.description: While airborne, tap normal attack to unleash Frustration. Each punch deals damage equal to 33.2% of ATK plus 2 and consumes 10 endurance. The last hit deals damage equal to 556.6% of ATK plus 29 and launches the target. When unleashing Frustration, grab the target if possible and throw it to the ground, dealing damage equal to 124.5% of ATK plus 7 in total.

skills.name: Accumulator
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack for up to 3 charges. Strongly suspend the target upon hit, and become immune from damage and control effects during an Accumulator attack. Releasing before getting hit can trigger Phantasia. Phase 1 charged hit: Deal damage equal to 96% of ATK plus 5. Phase 2 charged hit: Deal damage equal to 223% of ATK plus 12. Phase 3 charged hit: Deal damage equal to 360.5% of ATK plus 19.

skills.name: Shimmer
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack during normal attacks or after dodging to unleash Shimmer. Each punch deals damage equal to 20% of ATK plus 1 and consumes 10 endurance. Release to trigger Accumulator.

skills.name: Pummel
skills.description: While airborne, tap and hold normal attack to trigger 3 mid-air charges. Release to pummel the ground and strongly suspend targets. Releasing before getting hit can trigger Phantasia. Phase 1 charged attack: Deal damage equal to 166.3% of ATK plus 9. Phase 2 charged attack: Deal damage equal to 288.2% of ATK plus 15. Phase 3 charged attack: Deal damage equal to 454.4% of ATK plus 24.

skills.name: Mind Capture
skills.description: After dodging, tap normal attack to pull the target to you and draw it in for 2 seconds, dealing damage equal to 261.4% of ATK plus 14. Tapping and holding normal attack after dodging can trigger Shimmer after unleashing Mind Capture.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for 0.5 seconds and recover 250 endurance.

skills.name: Forgiveness Guard
skills.description: Forgiveness Guard: When the healing effect overflows, grant an HP Shield equal to up to 60% of Max HP. When Vesper has Forgiveness Guard, different guard effects are activated under different Resonances. Benediction Guard: The skill is replaced with Shinerise, and the Wanderer earn no more Enlightenment Guard, which is converted to Forgiveness Guard for teammates. Earn one Forgiveness Guard for each 15% of Max HP healed, and grant up to 1 Forgiveness Guard to every teammate. If every teammate has one, Forgiveness Guard deals physical damage equal to 120% of ATK to an enemy and disappears. That damage does not trigger extra attack effects. Also increase Max HP by 12.5% for self and teammates. Unstackable. Attack Guard: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain a shield equal to 30% of Max HP, with a Cooldown: 30 seconds. Fortitude Guard: When a Vesper skill hits, immediately gain healing, restoring 2% of Max HP per second for 20 seconds, with a Cooldown: 30 seconds. Balance Guard: When HP is more than 50%, increase Shatter by 20%. When HP is less than 50%, increase Final Damage by 10% and Shatter by 10%.

skills.name: Starfall
skills.description: Leap towards the target, dealing damage equal to 702.1% of ATK plus 37 and strongly suspending it. Inflict an Enlightenment mark on the target for 18 seconds. Cooldown: 20 seconds.

skills.name: Shinerise
skills.description: Pummel the ground and strongly launch targets in front, dealing damage equal to 702.1% of ATK plus 37 and summoning up to 3 Blades for 75 seconds (up to 1 Blade every 2 meters). This skill can be used up to 3 times, with a cooldown of 20 seconds each time. When 2 Blades exist on the field, a Clearshine is created. When a Blade is touched, it heals targets within the movement radius, restoring HP equal to 25% of the target's ATK. When 3 Blades exist, a Nebula is created. When a Blade is touched, it damages targets within the movement radius, dealing damage equal to 150% of ATK x movement distance / 5m.

skills.name: Chanting Sigh
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, switching to this weapon from another removes all debuffs from the wielder and unleashes Chanting Sigh, dealing damage equal to 748.1% of ATK plus 39 and adding an Enlightenment mark to the target for 18 seconds, during which damage immunity lasts 2.6 seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

weapon_type.name: Grievous
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will cause enemies to become grievous for 7 seconds, increasing their damage received by 20% and dealing damage equal to {1}% of ATK. When in team play, grievous targets receive an additional 20% physical damage.

weapon_resonance.name: Physical Resonance
weapon_resonance.description: Physical Resonance: Increase physical ATK by 15% and physical resistance by 25%. Activate by equipping 2 or more physical weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Physical Resonance or Physical Reaction effects, and Physical Resonance takes effect first. Physical Benediction: Increase physical ATK by 5% when Benediction Resonance is activated.

advancement: When releasing any weapon skill or discharge, if your Guards are at the maximum, the Guard duration will be refreshed, dealing physical damage equal to 100% of physical ATK x number of Guards to the enemy. Up to 8 Guards when under the effect of Benediction, and up to 6 without it.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.

Increase all damage dealt by Guards by 20%, and increase the guarded target's final damage by 15% for 10 seconds when releasing any weapon skill or discharge under the effect of Benediction Resonance.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 32%.

Forgiveness Guard: After releasing Resonance 5 times, receive 1 chance to negate fatal damage for the wielder and the guarded target. After a teammate negates fatal damage, they will consume Forgiveness Guard and recover 5% of Max HP. Unavailable in Apex League. Enlightenment Guard: After releasing Resonance 5 times and when having Enlightenment Guard, the wielder receives 2 chances to negate fatal damage. Stack up to 5 times. After the wielder negates fatal damage, they will consume 1 stack of Enlightenment Guard and recover 5% of Max HP. Unavailable in Apex League.

When unleashing any weapon skill or discharge, the increase of final damage and healing depends on the number of Guards. Each Guard increases final damage and healing by 1.6%, up to 8% for 25 seconds.

traits.name: Heartswitch
traits.description: Benediction Resonance: Increase Max HP by {0}% for the entire team. Unstackable.

traits.name: Bless
traits.description: Benediction Resonance: Increase Max HP by {0}% for the entire team. This effect cannot be stacked. Additionally, increase your Max HP by {1}%. Each time you successfully use the skill while having hyperbody or more than 50% HP, grant hyperbody to all allies for {2} seconds.
